title: Drawing, "George C. and Eleanor Hutton Rand Apartment: Kitchen and Dining Room Layout", May 15, 1934
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 520-1A/1/2"=1'0"/RAND, WESTERVELT/ 5/15/34/. 5/21/34, 3/ 8/14/34, 8/14/34, 4; inscribed in graphite, upper right: DINING ROOM/AND KITCHEN/ KITCHEN/PARTITION BY LANDLORD/LAVATORY " "/KITCHEN EQUIPMENT BY OWNER/STOVE & REFRIGERATOR BY OWNER/NEW CLOSET, DOOR & TRIM/BY THIS CONTRACTOR ALSO/WIRING & REMOVAL; inscribed to the right: SCHEDULE: (Dining Rm) New linoleum floor/New Glass Brick Screen (Structural Glass Company/OLID Block (?)/New Mirror Aluminum Frame/Patching of entrance to Living Rm./New Base Outlet/, WITCHES ETC./New Metal Doors and Frames (Glazed with Pittsburgh Magnalite)/New Rad Plaster enclosure & cornice over door/New Hardware/Remove plaster cornice; lower right: NOTE: SEE REVISED DRAWING OF KITCHEN; dimensions, materials, and instructions in graphite
description: Floor plan and elevations for kitchen and dining room. North wall of dining room with full length mirror at left, green glass brick wall at center. South wall has double-door entrance with metal grilles in geometric pattern. Window and sill to right of door. West wall has dining table and four upholstered armchairs; dining table has U-shaped base and reflector at center. East wall has low rectangular sideboard with rounded front edges, three stacked drawers and cabinet door at left. Door to left of sideboard enters into kitchen. North wall of kitchen has door and cabinet near right. East wall has refrigerator and overhead cabinet at left, stove at center, and cabinet space at right. Sink and counterspace on west wall. Lavatory between dining room and kitchen with toilet and small circular sink.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "George C. and Eleanor Hutton Rand Apartment: Kitchen and Dining Room Layout", May 15, 1934.
May 15, 1934. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-533.
